Key Match Events: Cleveland Guardians defeated Detroit Tigers in Game 4 of the AL Division Series
David Fry's pinch-hit two-run home run in the seventh inning
Tigers' Emmanuel Clase secured the save despite a rough outing
Post-Match Reflections: The series will go to a decisive fifth game to determine the ALCS opponent
Tigers' resilience and unexpected playoff run highlighted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was tied 2-2 after four games
Series featured multiple dramatic moments and key performances
